name: Gone Golfing
description:
Story

After having a bad day at work you decide to go for a nice and relaxing afterwork at the newly opened cozy cove mini golf resort, but something is not quite right.


The game

Gone Golfing is a first person golfing game that combines multiple elements from eldritch horror to comedy slashers.
Not only will you have to play golf, you will also have to survive and solve puzzles.

Features

  • Physics Based Golfing
  • Survival Horror with enemy AI that will hunt you
  • Unique Puzzle Solving
  • Deep story with multiple endings
  • Surreal environment, combining Lovecraftian horror with 80's slashers
